org.codehaus.mojo.taglist

Class TagListReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
        • org.codehaus.mojo.taglist.TagListReport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenReport

    public class TagListReport
extends org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
    Scans the source files for tags and generates a report on their occurrences.
    Author:
    Fabrice Bellingard
    Is defined by the goal name:
    taglist
